# Carrot Cake

## Ingredients

### Cake
* 2 cups sugar
* 1 cup vegetable oil
* 3 eggs
* 2.25 cups flour
* 1 tsp salt
* 2 tsp cinnamon
* 2 tsp bakin powder
* 3 tsp vanilla extract
* 3 cups grated carrots
* 0.5 cups chopped nuts

### Icing

* 3.5 cups powdered sugar
* 3 oz cream cheese
* 1.5 Tbl milk
* 1.5 tsp grated citrus (orange, lemon) rind or 1/2 tsp vanilla extract or 1/2 tsp cinnamon.

## Instructions

### Cake

Combine the sugar and oil and mix well. Then add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add remaining ingredients. Bake in a well greaded bread pan at 350&deg;F for 40-45 minutes.

### Icing

Beat powdered sugar, cream cheese, and milk until well mixed. Add grated citrus, vanilla, or cinnamon and mix. 

Ice cake once it is cool and refridgerate (because of the cream cheese in the icing)
